list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used to give an affirmative response.
used as a response to someone addressing one or otherwise trying to attract one's attention.
used to question a remark or ask for more detail about it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: “It should be easy to check.” “Oh yes? How?”
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: "Nó nên dễ dàng để kiểm tra."
"Khi bạn mua những bức ảnh đó ..." "Có?"

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: plenty to eat, including hot roast beef sandwiches (yes!)
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Rất nhiều để ăn, bao gồm bánh sandwich thịt bò nướng nóng (có!)

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an affirmative answer or decision, especially in voting.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: answering with assured and ardent yeses
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trả lời với yên tâm và có yeses
